item.title: Apprentice News Reader (Level 1)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Apprentice Product Manager (Level 1)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Web Designer (Level 1)
item.description: Instantly browse your working repository in gitweb with git instaweb

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 1)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Apprentice Socialite (Level 2)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Dentist
item.description: Extracted patches using git log -p.

item.title: Apprentice Historian (Level 3)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Gipsy (Level 1)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 1)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Author (Level 3)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Historian (Level 2)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Banker (Level 1)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Stone Mason (Level 3)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 1)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 1)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 1)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.
